name: Slipstream
descr:
[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/732810/extras/slip1.png?t=1707506878[/img]

[b]Slipstream[/b] is a racing game inspired by the visuals, music, games and cars from the late 80s and early 90s. It's built on a custom game engine, with an authentic retro feel and unique graphics. The soundtrack, drawing from synthpop and jazz fusion influences, sets the tone for a race across a variety of exotic locations from all around the world, including cities, deserts, forests, mountains and beaches. Drifting and slipstreaming mechanics add depth to the driving gameplay, and the result is a challenging and exciting experience.[h2]Features[/h2][list][li] Authentic pseudo-3D game engine with 2D graphics, just like the glory days of the arcade racers.
[/li][li] 20 Different tracks, set on a variety of exotic locations all around the world... and beyond.
[/li][li] Local multiplayer up to 4 players!
[/li][li] 6 Game modes:
[list][li] Grand Tour, a road trip through exotic landscapes, with branching paths and rivals to race against.
[/li][li] Cannonball, a freely customizable race mode with optional traffic, rivals and other racers
[/li][li] Grand Prix, a championship mode with five races back to back and money prizes used to upgrade your car!
[/li][li] Single Race, just a race in any of the game's 20 tracks
[/li][li] Time Trial, a solo race against time 
[/li][li] Battle Royale, an elimination endurance race mode[/li][/list][/li][li] 5 Car models, each with its own specs and playstyle.
[/li][li] Original soundtrack with 9 exclusive songs + you can add your own music.
[/li][li] A variety of graphical options to customize the game's visuals, including 30fps mode, CRT and NTSC filters.[/li][/list]
